content.raw:
One brief comment: I guess it makes sense to use the "SameMajorVersion" compatibility policy to be consistent with the API stability policy of Gazebo.  
However the fact that find_package(Gazebo 4.0) uses a "SameMajorVersion" policy should be properly documented, as I am afraid that most developer could wrongly assume that it follows a "AnyNewerVersion" policy instead.
I imagine that in practice most of the third-party plugin developers maintain  a codebase compatible with the API of different major Gazebo version, and this could reinforce the wrong assumption.
